full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CES RANG DANG SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO SOGS LA BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN SPEL PHYIR BYIN 'BEBS GSOL 'DEBS AE WAm CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RANG DANG SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO SOGS LA BKRA SHIS KYI DGE MTSAN SPEL PHYIR BYIN 'BEBS GSOL 'DEBS AE WAm CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS SPRUL SKU DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GSUNG RGYUN LTAR, SHING YOS MO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR TSES GNYIS PAR DBEN GNAS AE WAm DGA' 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,BHA WANTU, ,)
